data.title: Integrated Healthcare Communications Agency - GCI Health
data.meta_description: GCI Health is a full-service, integrated healthcare communications agency. We share our clients’ desire to improve the health of all people around the world through communication.

Company philosophy intro block

Who we are

We power communications that advance health and well-being worldwide

We are a global community 100 percent dedicated to helping the world’s leading health organizations tell their stories in meaningful, authentic ways. We treat our clients’ stakeholders – patients, healthcare providers, caregivers, payers and policymakers – as individuals with unique lived experiences that shape their views about health and healthcare brands. We dig deep to understand people’s motivations and influences. The result is human-driven storytelling and programming that inspire action and drive results.

Company culture intro block

Our Culture

Inspired by People is more than a tagline

It’s how we live, act and work together. Unlike places that are a step in the journey, GCI Health is the destination for top talent who deliver the best work in healthcare communications. We surround our people with senior support, benefits and opportunities to succeed professionally and personally. That’s why, year after year, we are recognized as a Best Place to Work.

Intro block about Equity, Diversity and Inclusion

Diversity, Equity and Inclusion

We create a space where everyone’s thoughts and contributions are valued

As an agency Inspired by People, we are committed to an intentionally inclusive culture where equity and diversity are standard. We look for talent outside traditional channels. We value differing perspectives, unique lived experiences and dimensions of difference. It contributes to the way we interact with one another and the counsel we provide to clients. We’re proud to be a place where representation matters and every voice is heard.

GCI Group Launches Muse, an Integrated Celebrity and Influencer Engine for Global Health Brands

GCI Group introduced Muse, an integrated global practice that brings together the agency’s award-winning celebrity and influencer offerings under one umbrella.

New GCI Health Survey Examines Barriers to Black Women’s Participation in Clinical Trials

GCI Health released new research today that provides insight into Black women’s participation in clinical trials and challenges assumptions that have fueled their lack of representation.

GCI Health Welcomes Dan Oh to Its Creative Leadership Team

GCI Health today announced that Dan Oh has joined the agency’s creative leadership team as Group Senior Vice President, Group Creative Director.

Intro block about worldwide coverage

We’re your local guide to global markets

GCI Health’s global offices are more than dots on a map. Our on-the-ground teams combine a passion for health and science with local market expertise that respects cultural nuances, norms and dialects to drive authentic engagement around the world. We can be anywhere you are – poised to expand and grow as the challenges and opportunities for healthcare evolve.
